Function reference

Area of applicability functions

predict(<ww_area_of_applicability>)
Predict from a ww_area_of_applicability
ww_area_of_applicability()
Find the area of applicability

Multi-scale assessment functions

ww_multi_scale()
Evaluate metrics at multiple scales of aggregation

Autocorrelation metrics

ww_global_moran_i() ww_global_moran_i_vec() ww_global_moran_pvalue() ww_global_moran_pvalue_vec() ww_global_moran()
Global Moran's I statistic
ww_local_moran_i() ww_local_moran_i_vec() ww_local_moran_pvalue() ww_local_moran_pvalue_vec() ww_local_moran()
Local Moran's I statistic
ww_global_geary_c() ww_global_geary_c_vec() ww_global_geary_pvalue() ww_global_geary_pvalue_vec() ww_global_geary()
Global Geary's C statistic
ww_local_geary_c() ww_local_geary_c_vec() ww_local_geary_pvalue() ww_local_geary_pvalue_vec() ww_local_geary()
Local Geary's C statistic
ww_local_getis_ord_g() ww_local_getis_ord_g_vec() ww_local_getis_ord_pvalue() ww_local_getis_ord_pvalue_vec() ww_local_getis_ord()
Local Getis-Ord G and G* statistic

Utilities

ww_build_neighbors()
Make 'nb' objects from sf objects
ww_build_weights()
Build "listw" objects of spatial weights
ww_make_point_neighbors()
Make 'nb' objects from point geometries
ww_make_polygon_neighbors()
Make 'nb' objects from polygon geometries

Data

guerry
Guerry "Moral Statistics" (1830s)
ny_trees
Number of trees and aboveground biomass for Forest Inventory and Analysis plots in New York State
